title: Error Handling and Observability
body_html:
Error Handling and Observability

Error Handling

  • Validate inputs; return structured errors
  • Catch trigger errors; log and continue
  • Capture HTTP errors (status/body) in attempts

Metrics

  • Counters: deliveries total by status
  • Histogram: delivery duration
  • Gauge: active webhooks

Health

  • /api/health includes webhook checks
  • /metrics for Prometheus

Logging

  • Structured logs (JSON) with context: webhookId, eventId, url, duration, status
